currency.DescJp: 先生が持っているカードのポイント、通称「クレジット」。クレジットポイントは特定の状況で、現金のように自由に使える。
currency.DescEn: Credit Points are kept on Sensei's card and can be used like cash.
currency.DescKr: 선생님이 소유한 카드의 크레딧 포인트. 크레딧 포인트는 특정 상황에서 현금처럼 자유롭게 사용할 수 있다.
currency.DescTw: 老師持有的卡片的信用點數。在特定情況下，信用點數可像現金一樣自由使用。

currency.DescJp: 大人のカードで購入できる神秘的な宝石。様々な商品を購入・取引できる。
currency.DescEn: These mystical gems can be purchased with Sensei's credit card. Trade them for various products.
currency.DescKr: 어른의 카드로 구입할 수 있는 신비한 보석. 다양한 상품을 거래할 수 있다.
currency.DescTw: 可用大人的卡片購買的神秘寶石。可交易各式商品。

currency.DescJp: 大人のカードで購入できる神秘的な宝石。様々な商品を購入・取引できる。
currency.DescEn: Sensei's vigor level. It is depleted when you perform certain actions.
currency.DescKr: 선생님의 활력 수치. 각종 행동을 할 때마다 소비된다.
currency.DescTw: 老師的活力數值。進行各種活動時會消耗。

currency.NameJp: 指名手配（市街地戦）チケット
currency.DescJp: 指名手配に挑戦できるチケット。
currency.DescEn: A ticket to participate in a Bounty.
currency.DescTw: 可挑戰懸賞通緝的票券

currency.NameJp: 指名手配（屋外戦）チケット
currency.DescJp: 指名手配に挑戦できるチケット。
currency.DescEn: A ticket to participate in a Bounty.
currency.DescTw: 可挑戰懸賞通緝的票券

currency.NameJp: 指名手配（屋内戦）チケット
currency.DescJp: 指名手配に挑戦できるチケット。
currency.DescEn: A ticket to participate in a Bounty.
currency.DescTw: 可挑戰懸賞通緝的票券

currency.NameJp: 学園交流会（トリニティ）チケット
currency.DescJp: 学園交流会に参加できるチケット
currency.DescEn: A ticket to participate in a Scrimmage.
currency.DescTw: 可挑戰學園交流會的票券

currency.NameJp: 学園交流会（ゲヘナ）チケット
currency.NameTw: 學園交流會(格黑娜) 票券
currency.DescJp: 学園交流会に参加できるチケット
currency.DescEn: A ticket to participate in a Scrimmage.
currency.DescTw: 可挑戰學園交流會的票券

currency.NameJp: 学園交流会（ミレニアム）チケット
currency.NameTw: 學園交流會(千年) 票券
currency.DescJp: 学園交流会に参加できるチケット
currency.DescEn: A ticket to participate in a Scrimmage.
currency.DescTw: 可挑戰學園交流會的票券

currency.DescJp: 合同火力演習に参加するためのチケット
currency.DescEn: A ticket to participate in the Joint Firing Drill.
currency.DescTw: 可報考綜合戰術考試的票券。

Buff_AmmoCount.tooltip_body:
Increases Magazine Count.
The higher this value, the more times a character can use their normal attack before having to reload their weapon.

Buff_ATK.tooltip_body:
Increases Attack.
The higher this value, the more damage this character will deal with attacks and skills.

Buff_AttackSpeed.tooltip_body:
Increases Attack Speed.
The higher this value, the quicker this character will execute normal attacks and reloads.

Buff_BlockRate.tooltip_body:
Increases Block Rate.
The higher this value, the higher the chance of successfully blocking attacks when this character takes cover.

Buff_ConcentratedTarget.tooltip_body: Allies will prioritise attacking the target marked with this debuff.

Buff_CostChange.tooltip_body: Reduces the cost of this character's EX skill.

Buff_CostRegen.tooltip_body:
Increases Cost Recovery.
The higher this value, the higher the rate at which this character generates skill cost.

Buff_CriticalChance.tooltip_body:
Increases Crit.
The higher this value, the higher the chance of landing a critical hit when attacking.

Buff_CriticalChanceResistPoint.tooltip_body:
Increases Crit RES.
The higher this value, the lower the chance of receiving a critical hit from enemy attacks.

Buff_CriticalDamage.tooltip_body:
Increases Crit DMG.
The higher this value, the more damage critical hits will deal.

Buff_CriticalDamageRateResist.tooltip_body:
Increases Critical Damage Resistance.
The higher this value, the lower the damage received from enemies' critical hits.

Buff_DamagedRatio.tooltip_body:
Increases Damage Resistance.
The higher this value, the higher the percentage reduction of all incoming damage.

Buff_DEF.tooltip_body:
Increases Defense.
The higher this value, the lower the damage this character will receive from enemy attacks.

Buff_Dodge.tooltip_body:
Increases Evasion.
The higher this value, the higher the chance of this character successfully evading enemy attacks.

Buff_EnhanceExplosionRate.tooltip_body: Increases the bonus damage dealt by Explosive type attacks against Light Armor targets.

Buff_EnhancePierceRate.tooltip_body: Increases the bonus damage dealt by Piercing type attacks against Heavy Armor targets.

Buff_EnhanceMysticRate.tooltip_body: Increases the bonus damage dealt by Mystic type attacks against Special Armor targets.

Buff_HealByHit_Damaged.tooltip_body: Restores HP each time damage is taken from an attack.

Buff_HealEffectiveness.tooltip_body:
Increases Recovery Boost.
The higher this value, the higher the amount of HP restored to this character by incoming healing abilities.

Buff_HealPower.tooltip_body:
Increases Healing.
The higher this value, the higher the amount of HP restored by healing abilities, and HP absorbed by barrier abilities of this character.

Buff_HIT.tooltip_body:
Increases Accuracy.
The higher this value, the lower the chance of this character's attacks being evaded by enemies.

Buff_MAXHP.tooltip_body:
Increases Maximum HP.
If this character's HP reaches 0, they will be unable to continue fighting.

Buff_MoveSpeed.tooltip_body:
Increases Movement Speed.
The higher this value, the quicker this character will be able to move.

Buff_OppressionPower.tooltip_body:
Increases Crowd Control Power.
The higher this value, the higher the chance of successfully inflicting a crowd-control effect.

Buff_OppressionResist.tooltip_body:
Increases Crowd Control RES.
The higher this value, the lower the chance of being inflicted with a crowd-control effect.

Buff_Penetration.tooltip_body:
Increases Defense Piercing.
The higher this value, the more defense will be ignored when attacking enemies.

Buff_Range.tooltip_body:
Increases Range.
The higher this value, the greater the distance from which this character can normal attack from.

Buff_Shield.tooltip_body: Absorbs a set amount of HP damage.

Buff_Stability.tooltip_body:
Increases Stability.
The higher this value, the smaller the damage variance range will be when attacking.

Debuff_AmmoCount.tooltip_body:
Decreases Magazine Count.
The higher this value, the more times a character can use their normal attack before having to reload their weapon.

Debuff_ATK.tooltip_body:
Decreases Attack.
The higher this value, the more damage this character will deal with attacks and skills.

Debuff_AttackSpeed.tooltip_body:
Decreases Attack Speed.
The higher this value, the quicker this character will execute normal attacks and reloads.

Debuff_BlockRate.tooltip_body:
Decreases Block Rate.
The higher this value, the higher the chance of successfully blocking attacks when this character takes cover.

Debuff_Burn.tooltip_body: Continuously receives burn damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.

Debuff_Chill.tooltip_body: Continuously receives chill damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.

Debuff_ConcentratedTarget.tooltip_body: Allies will prioritise attacking the target marked with this debuff.

Debuff_CostChange.tooltip_body: Increases the cost of this character's EX skill.

Debuff_CriticalChance.tooltip_body:
Decreases Crit.
The higher this value, the higher the chance of landing a critical hit when attacking.

Debuff_CriticalChanceResistPoint.tooltip_body:
Decreases Critical Resistance.
The higher this value, the lower the chance of receiving a critical hit from enemy attacks.

Debuff_CriticalDamage.tooltip_body:
Decreases Crit Damage.
The higher this value, the more damage critical hits will deal.

Debuff_CriticalDamageRateResist.tooltip_body:
Decreases Critical Damage Resistance.
The higher this value, the lower the damage received from enemies' critical hits.

Debuff_DamageByHit_Damaged.tooltip_body: Inflicts additional damage every time this target is hit.

Debuff_DamagedRatio.tooltip_body:
Decreases Damage Resistance.
The higher this value, the higher the percentage reduction of all incoming damage.

Debuff_DEF.tooltip_body:
Decreases Defense.
The higher this value, the lower the damage this character will receive from enemy attacks.

Debuff_Dodge.tooltip_body:
Decreases Evasion.
The higher this value, the higher the chance of this character successfully evading enemy attacks.

Debuff_EnhanceExplosionRate.tooltip_body: Decreases the bonus damage dealt by Explosive type attacks against Light Armor targets.

Debuff_EnhancePierceRate.tooltip_body: Decreases the bonus damage dealt by Piercing type attacks against Heavy Armor targets.

Debuff_EnhanceMysticRate.tooltip_body: Decreases the bonus damage dealt by Mystic type attacks against Special Armor targets.

Debuff_HealEffectiveness.tooltip_body:
Decreases Recovery Boost.
The higher this value, the higher the amount of HP restored to this character by incoming healing abilities.

Debuff_HealPower.tooltip_body:
Decreases Healing.
The higher this value, the higher the amount of HP restored by healing abilities, and HP absorbed by barrier abilities of this character.

Debuff_Hieronymus.tooltip_body: Inflicts continuous damage over time. Inflicts a large amount of damage in a circular area around the target if this debuff is not removed before it expires. This debuff can only be removed by healing the afflicted to 100% HP.

Debuff_HIT.tooltip_body:
Decreases Accuracy.
The higher this value, the lower the chance of this character's attacks being evaded by enemies.

Debuff_MAXHP.tooltip_body:
Decreases Maximum HP.
If this character's HP reaches 0, they will be unable to continue fighting.

Debuff_MoveSpeed.tooltip_body:
Decreases Movement Speed.
The higher this value, the quicker this character will be able to move.

Debuff_OppressionPower.tooltip_body:
Decreases CC Power.
The higher this value, the higher the chance of successfully inflicting a crowd-control effect.

Debuff_OppressionResist.tooltip_body:
Decreases CC Resistance.
The higher this value, the lower the chance of being inflicted with a crowd-control effect.

Debuff_Penetration.tooltip_body:
Decreases Defense Piercing.
The higher this value, the more defense will be ignored when attacking enemies.

Debuff_Poison.tooltip_body: Continuously receives poison damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.

Debuff_Range.tooltip_body:
Increases Range.
The higher this value, the greater the distance from which this character can normal attack from.

Debuff_Stability.tooltip_body:
Increases Stability.
The higher this value, the smaller the damage variance range will be when attacking.

Debuff_CostRegen.tooltip_body:
Decreases Cost Recovery.
The higher this value, the higher the rate at which this character generates skill cost.

CC_Fear.tooltip_body: Unable to act and will slowly move away from whoever inflicted fear on them. Also interrupts any active skills.

CC_Stunned.tooltip_body: Unable to act and interrupts any active skills.

CC_Provoke.tooltip_body: Forced to attack whoever inflicted taunt on them. Also interrupts any active skills.

Special_EnergyBatteryHalf.tooltip_body:
Increases the effectiveness of Aris's EX and Sub skills by 1.5× (half) or 2× (full).
Charge level resets to empty after EX skill use.

Special_Immortal.tooltip_body: Able to survive lethal damage with 1 HP for the duration of this effect.

Special_Fury.tooltip_body: Increases the damage dealt by Neru's EX Skill.

Special_Misdeed.tooltip_body: Generates skill cost when Aru (New Year) uses her EX Skill. Defense is decreased for each stack held.

Special_LittleDevil.tooltip_body: Increases the damage dealt by Mutuski (New Year)'s Basic Skill when at 6 stacks. Critical Damage is increased for each stack held.

Special_Accumulation.tooltip_body: All damage dealt to this target for the duration of the effect will be accumulated and dealt again as an additional hit once this expires.

Special_CostRegenBan.tooltip_body: Cost Recovery is halted for this character.

Special_SuddenDeath.tooltip_body: A stack of 5 will deal lethal damage to the character.

contents: Students: Added information for student's favorite items.
Students: Added SSR gifts to favorite gifts list.
Crafting: Added drop information for 3rd tier crafting nodes.
Students: Added information for Hoshino, Shizuko, Izuna and Chise (Swimsuit).
Stages: Added information for Scrimmage D
Items: Added new items and furniture from the latest JP event update.
Raids: Added season point rewards for Total Assault bosses.
Several bug fixes.
Added student skill descriptions for Chinese.
Fixed an issue where some item descriptions would not display correctly in Chinese.
Improved handling of updates - Schale DB will now refresh automatically when there is an updated version available.
Students: Added and updated skill descriptions for Korean and Japanese.
Stages: Improved display of the Events tab.
Added partial Korean and Traditional Chinese translations.
UI: Standardised stat and buff names in English to closer match the in-game terminology.
Students: Improved interface for changing stat preview options.
Stages: Added ability to preview stage maps in a larger window.
Added a Service Worker to allow for more efficient caching of resources. (Should greatly reduce the amount of data usage if you are a frequent user)
Schale DB can now be installed as a PWA.
Stages: Added stage maps for all Campaign and Event stages.
Stages: Clicking on an enemy unit on the map will list enemies appearing in that unit.
Stages: Added information for Event Challenge stages and event reruns.
UI: Several UI improvements to Stages and Raid lists.
UI: Current event stages will now be shown at the top of the list.
Raids: Added information for Combined Operations.
Stages: Updated information for Special Operations: Decagrammaton for the global server.
Students: Added information for Wakamo, Nonomi and Ayane (Swimsuit).
Stages: Added information for Abydos Resort Restoration event stages.
Stages: Added 3 star targets and entry cost amounts to stage information (Maps are coming very soon™.)
Raids: Added information for Hieronymus Insane.
Raids: Adjusted the description for raid skills that increase incoming damage.
Students: Added ability to compare a student's stats with another. (Stats will be compared as if they were the same level, grade, relationship rank and wearing equivalent tiers of equipment.)
Students: Added clear filters button to the student list.
